intro.title: Welcome to Fishcremental!
intro.content:
Welcome, angler! Ready to catch some fish?

Getting Started:

  • Cast your line - Click the "Cast Line" button to start fishing
  • Catch fish - Wait for a bite, then reel it in!
  • Sell your catch - Visit the Inventory tab to sell fish for money
  • Upgrade gear - Buy better rods and bait in the Shop
  • Explore locations - Travel to new lakes to find rare fish
  • Complete quests - Earn Quest Tokens for special equipment and upgrades

Tips:

  • Bigger fish = more money and XP
  • Better rods let you catch stronger fish without breaking your line
  • Different lakes have different fish species
  • Seasons change as you fish - some fish are more common in certain seasons
  • Complete quests to earn Quest Tokens for powerful upgrades!

Good luck and tight lines! 🎣

changes: More UI updates, more compact views.
The fish screen moves around a bit less, should be easier to look at.
Added another quest token upgrade!
Fish finder, purchasable from the quest token shop, allows you to see the actual percentage chance of each fish on the odds screen.
Added 9 more achievements (66 total now), for fish weights and token purchases.
Achievements are in! Rods get a change! Baits are itemized!
57 achievements were added for existing game content.  You may have gotten a few just from logging back in, try reseting your game data from the stats screen to start over!
Rods were changed from a straight progression to a choice of speed or strength, and eventually a combination of both.
Baits are now itemized and can attract or repel certain fish species.  This should allow for better targeting of quest fish!
Added some more sounds.
Moved version into the header, click to view change log.
Fixed the issue that made sound stop working.
Made the intro display if it has not been seen before.
Moved to the cloud! You may have lost your save, I will try to prevent that from now on, Fihscremental.com is now live!
Fixed some mobile display issues.  Still not pretty, but at least all screens are visible. More to come.
Cleaned up code, reorganized data storage.
Changed 'baits' to 'hooks', to make room for baits.
Hooks provide a size multiplier to fish.
Data Overhaul!  Moved all the javascript data into json and load them on start up.
New loading splash screen while data loads.
Style Facelift!  A work in progress, changing the color scheme up a bit, making things a bit more compact.
Fishing Conditions!
Lake locations and seasons now effect your catch chances!
A button has been added to the fish screen that allows you to see your current conditions.
Initial release
12 fishing locations across the United States
50+ fish species with varying rarities
Quest system with dynamic objectives
Equipment system with hats, vests, tackle boxes, and boots
Permanent upgrades available via Quest Tokens
Consumable items for tactical advantages
Season progression system
Comprehensive statistics and records tracking
Imperial/Metric unit switching
Audio system with sound effects
Auto-save functionality
